title: most faithful digitization poll
content:
Allo allo:

Quick question, but it requires some thought, but it possibly yields a quick answer. ;)

Who has the best/most accurate/most faithful digitisation of ATF Bodoni?  
Similar question, but for Akzidenz Grotesk? Lange's version is well-done, of course, but it's too clean. It feels like it was run through the Helvetica-tron. ;)

This is all for a slightly complicated research project, so if anybody wants a slightly convoluted explanation, I'd be more than happy.

Thanks...
